name: Loop Island: Motorcycle Grand Prix!
description:
GENERAL INFORMATION

Loop Island's Grand prix is just right here! Feel like a rider and try to push yourself as much as you can! Your main target is be the fastest on the track. But, watch out... There'll be some hazards that you'll have to dodge!

This game was made for Black and White Jam #8. The theme is "Loop". It has been made in Godot Engine. There are executables for Linux, Windows, Mac OSX and HTML version. Please, check our gitlab page, Discord group or, if you want,  can also check out our web page.

CONTROLS

Use Z button to accelerate and UP to jump with your motorcycle.

If you release the Z button when you reach a high speed, the bike will brake a little bit to manage its fuel. Good luck!

CREDITS Code, music and graphics:
  • Salvador Moreno (Alda)
Main supervisors:
  • Cayetano Manchón (Tano)
  • Antonio Maciá (Tonet)
